UberX PARTNERS Company!

We Invite drivers! On own car!

UberX Company is fast-paced growing and ocupies leading position on market among taxi companies. All is absolutely transparent, so you can controll all processes inside you own online Profile. Bonus system. Beside fulfiled orders, company adds bonuses for the rush ours.

We are the best company in Copenhagen. Our drivers make over 2000€ a month.
Advantages
8 reasons to work with us
No cash, payment are done automatically
Trip price are paid by passenger with credit card online during pick order. So no risks with carrying cash for passenger, either drive. Moreover, you don't need to have a deal with coin change.
Comission is 8% + BONUSES
We have minimal comission and we pay off bonuses for every trip. Some our competitors leave bonuses for themself. We work fair and drivers earn more with us!
High income with garanteed payment
We pay wage on personal drivers account. You don't need register self-employment or company and do corresponding paperwork.
Work at convenient time, no schedules.
You just tap "Start" button inside your online profile of our mobile application to start work and getting orders. When you deside finish to work you just tap "Finish" button. It is possible to work only in the morning, evening, weekend or holydays!
Convenient, transparent and simple set up.
We set up remotely and for free, you don't have to visit us. Once you sent us your copies of your documents we register you and send you regisering information. After 1 to 2 days you can start to work!
Always huge amount of orders
Application shows where is the biggest amount of orders at the moment and where's set increased rates. You won't wait or idle.
24/7 support
UberX proveds 24/7 support for drivers. If you have any question you can always contact online our specialist.
Without painting or labeling
You don't need to change color, set lights or put labels.

Conditions and requirements
Conditions: with own car:
  • Connect to system for 10%
  • No prepaid 0%!
  • Possible to connect remotely without comming to office
  • self-employment not required
  • Orders are distributed among nearest drivers
    regardless rates
  • Work including only non-cash transaction
Earnings per day is about 150-250€ + bonus 50+€
Conditions: with company's car:
  • We offer a car without prepayment
  • Without leasing payoffs
  • Wednesday, Friday, Satturday you work for company
    the rest of the days on yourself!
Requirments:
  • Owning a car without advertisment
  • Car shouldn't be yellow or yellow
    license plate
  • Car shouldn't be older than 3 years
  • Driving expirience are more than 3 years
  • Smartphone should have Android 10 and
    younger or any iOS
Documents:
  • Drivere's licence (both sides)
  • Passport (1st page)
  • Remote profile creation
  • License (if have one)
  • Phone number
  • Banking account number
